title: Dotfyle Metadata
description: Metadata information generated by dotfyle-metadata.nvim plugin

plugins.description: List of plugins installed by the user.

pluginManager.description: Name of the plugin manager used to install plugins.

leaderKey.description: Leader key used by the user.

lspServers.description: List of LSP servers setup by the user via nvim-lspconfig plugin.

treesitterParsers.description: List of tree-sitter parsers installed by the user via nvim-treesitter plugin.

rhs.description: Right-hand side of the keymap, the command to execute.

lhs.description: Left-hand side of the keymap, the key to use.

mode.description: Which mode this keymap will be executed from.

noremap.description: Is the keymap is a non-recursive keymap.

masonTools.description: List LSP servers and tools installed by mason.nvim plugin.

distribution.description: The detected distribution of the user's neovim setup.
